text: The École nationale supérieure de mécanique et des microtechniques is a engineering graduate school in France.Les diplômés de l'Ensmm très recherchés sur le marché de l'emploi It is in a campus of the University of Franche- Comté. Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees : * Ingénieur ENSMM (ENSMM Graduate engineer Masters level program) * Masters Recherche & Doctorat (PhD doctorate studies ) Academic activities and industrial applied research are normally done in French and English languages. Students from a dozen of nationalities participate to the different curricula at ENSMM. The school is specialized in watchmaking and microtechnology.L'HORLOGERIE RATTRAPE LE TEMPS PERDU == Research labs == Research activities at École nationale supérieure de mécanique et des microtechniques relate to the following topics: * Automatic and micro- mechatronic systems * Time-frequency * Applied mechanic * Micro-nanosciences and systems == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1902 establishments in France Category:Besançon
title: École nationale supérieure de mécanique et des microtechniques
